title: Navigate forwards to a slider in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the slider
refs: slider aria-labelledby aria-valuenow aria-valuetext aria-valuemin aria-valuemax
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Rating' slider.
assertion3: Textual value 'zero of five stars' is conveyed

assertion3: Textual value 'zero of five stars' is conveyed
